description: Loft conversion with rear dormer, front roof lights, hip to gable roof alterations, and increase in roof height.
decision_conditions: The proposed development including the roof enlargement would, by reason of its excessive overall bulk, mass and extensive roof area, be an intrusive and unneighbourly development, which would be most oppressive and give rise to an undue sense of enclosure to the detriment of residential amenity, especially to the occupiers of 59 Hubert Road, contrary to the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent via email on 8th August.
